snippet: A head-spinning real estate deal and a record number of homeless people in shelters told the story of 2011 in New York.
abstract: Ginia Bellafante Big City column examines the state of income disparities between New York City residents in 2011 and comments on their cultural impact, from Occupy Wall Street protests to television shows and art exhibits.
lead_paragraph: A head-spinning real estate deal and a record number of homeless people in shelters told the story of 2011 in New York.

headline.seo: In the City of Occupy, a Year of Extremes
headline.main: In the City of Occupy, a Year of Extremes
headline.print_headline: In the City of Occupy, A Year of Extremes
